comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Frederick William MacMonnies (September 28, 1863 – March 22, 1937) was the best known expatriate American sculptor of the Beaux-Arts school, as successful and lauded in France as he was in the United States. He was also a highly accomplished painter and portraitist." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_William_MacMonnies
